aircraft.value: Eagle Vision-9 - AC-3407-994 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Instrument display flickering. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 20/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 22/02/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 21/02/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 24/02/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 26/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
